 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָתֵר‎</span> [[Prov.12.26|Prov 12:26]], see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תור‎</span>. 

<small>Also see: [[H3491]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוּר‎</span> **verb** ==seek out, spy out, explore== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (rare); perhaps originally ***turn*** (to or about), Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***târu***</u></abbr>, ***turn about, back***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***taîru***</u></abbr> adjective ***turning back***, also ***merciful***, and substantive ***mercy***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) IV. ***go about*** (rare), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a go-between***) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְתִּי‎</span> [[Ezek.20.6|Ezek 20:6]]; [[Eccl.2.3|Eccl 2:3]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּרוּ‎</span> [[Num.13.32|Num 13:32]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְתֶּם‎</span> [[Num.14.24|Num 14:24]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָתֻ֫רוּ‎</span> [[Num.13.2|Num 13:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּתֻ֫רוּ‎</span> v[[Num.13.21|Num 13:21]] read also 3 masculine singular, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָתוּר‎</span> [[Job.39.8|Job 39:8]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] and most (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְתוּר‎</span>); 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּתוּ֫רוּ‎</span> [[Num.15.39|Num 15:39]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוּר‎</span> [[Num.10.33|Num 10:33]] +; ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּרִים‎</span> [[Num.14.6|Num 14:6]], on [[1Kgs.10.15|1Kgs 10:15]]; [[2Chr.9.14|2Chr 9:14]] see infra; — 

**1.** ***seek out, select:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָתוּר לָהֶם מִנוּחָה‎</span> [[Num.10.33|Num 10:33]] ([[BDB#J|J]], subject ark of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), compare [[Deut.1.33|Deut 1:33]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Ezek.20.6|Ezek 20:6]] (***id.***, accusative land); followed by infinitive = ***find out how*** to do something, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּלִבִּי לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Eccl.2.3|Eccl 2:3]]. 

**2.** ***spy out, explore***, accusative of land [[Num.13.2|Num 13:2]]; [[Num.13.16|Num 13:16]]; [[Num.13.17|Num 13:17]]; [[Num.13.21|Num 13:21]]; [[Num.13.23|Num 13:23]]; [[Num.13.32|Num 13:32]] (twice in verse); [[Num.14.7|Num 14:7]]; [[Num.14.34|Num 14:34]]; [[Num.14.36|Num 14:36]]; [[Num.14.38|Num 14:38]], accusative of mountains [[Job.39.8|Job 39:8]] (see above), compare Participle as subject ***explores, spies*** [[Num.14.6|Num 14:6]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]); ***explore*** mentally, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבַקֵּשׁ חָכְמָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָדַעַת וְלָת‎</span> [[Eccl.7.25|Eccl 7:25]], compare [[Eccl.9.1|Eccl 9:1]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> for  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בוּר‎</span> q. v.), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחָכְמָה עַלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָת‎</span> [[Eccl.1.13|Eccl 1:13]] ([[BDB#Kue|Kue]]<sup>Ond. 2, iii. 196</sup>). 

**3.** ***go about***, figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַהֲרִי לְבַבְכֶם‎</span> [[Num.15.39|Num 15:39]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַנְשֵׁי הַתָּרִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.10.15|1Kgs 10:15]]; [[2Chr.9.14|2Chr 9:14]], usually ***merchants*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹחֲרִים רִכְּ לִים‎</span>); [[BDB#Kit|Kit]], after [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] 2 Chronicles, proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעָרִים‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַתָּרִים‎</span> **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּתִ֫ירוּ בְּבֵיתאֵֿל‎</span> [[Judg.1.23|Judg 1:23]] ***they made a reconnoisance at Bethel*** ([[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] disagree, [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּחֲנוּ‎</span>, compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]); 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָתֵר מֵרֵעֵהוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַדִּיק‎</span> [[Prov.12.26|Prov 12:26]] ***the righteous searches out*** ([[BDB#RV|RV]] ***is a guide to***) ***his friend***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#AV|AV]] ***is more excellent than*** (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָתָר‎</span>), [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]] and others ***spies out his pasture*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְעֵהוּ‎</span>, in spiritual sense), all dubious; Toy conjectures <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָסֻר מֵרָעָה‎</span>.
